attributes.action: Encourage a major bid to bring WWE Wrestlemania to a British city
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
WWE Wrestlemania is one of the most watched annual events in the world. Such is the popularity of the event, American cities such as Houston and Orlando now actively seek to bid for the right to host the event, knowing of the tremendous positive financial impact on the host city - with no cost incurred (unlike the Olympics or World Cup).
With amazing stadia capable of hosting this event, such as the new Wembley and the Cardiff Millenium Stadium, it is time that Britain encouraged WWE chairman Vince McMahon to bring the flagship wrestling event to the UK for the first time.
